# 策略占星

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/celue-zhanxing
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/celue-zhanxing
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install celue-zhanxing
celue-zhanxing <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g celue-zhanxing
celue-zhanxing <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
